description: 29. Quora Author with 2.7 million+ views, writer, journalist, social media manager, and moderator. Obversa on Reddit. Writer on Star Wars, Harry Potter, etc.
text: @garbage_citizen @GirlswSabers @JoeIorio24 @SWTheory66 I hate that so much! Hindu mythology is quite clear that a "dyad" couple is never apart, whether they are in mortal form (i.e. avatars), or as divine gods. I don't know WTF Terrio and JJ Abrams were thinking there. It feels like they violated the mythology to seem "more PC".

Hindu Tej Jago!
